Class SpreadTileComponent

Used to have a tile spread in the tilemap.

Inheritance
System.Object
SpreadTileComponent
Implements
ITileComponent
Namespace: BFB.Engine.TileMap.TileComponent
Assembly: BFB.Engine.dll
Syntax
public class SpreadTileComponent : object, ITileComponent

Constructors

SpreadTileComponent(WorldTile, WorldTile, WorldTile, Byte)

Constructs a spread tile component with a given configuration.

Declaration
public SpreadTileComponent(WorldTile spreadBlock, WorldTile targetBlock, WorldTile aboveBlock = WorldTile.Unknown, byte randomness = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
WorldTile spreadBlock

The block that is placed while spreading.
WorldTile targetBlock

The block that will change configuration to the given spread block.
WorldTile aboveBlock

The block above the target block.
System.Byte randomness

How often the spreadBlock spreads.

Parameters
Type Name Description
WorldManager world

The manager for the world.
Chunk chunk

The chunk in a given world.
System.Int32 blockX

The x block in the given chunk.
System.Int32 blockY

The y block in the given chunk.
